page.title: 12Badlesmere : Housing
page.content: Most houses in the area are situated along the main A25l road and around Badlesmere Lees. Most property is owner occupied. Many old houses have been modernised, varying in size from large farm houses to rows of cottages, once occupied by farmworkers. Most of the modernisation has successfully retained the original character of the old houses and such property is much sought after. The few new buildings which are mainly bungalows or chalet style houses have been built in small groups. There is little rented accommodation apart from a row of council houses by Leaveland Church and some council owned old peoples' bungalows on Badlesmere Lees. Tight planning controls restrict new development.
